name: Cold Spiced Tomato Soup
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon ground asafetida (optional, sold in spice stores or Indian food markets)
2 cups water or defatted chicken stock
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Heat heavy saucepan. Add mustard and cumin seeds and cook over high heat until they begin to sputter and dance around. Stir in the jalapeno and ginger, lower the heat and cook gently for a couple of minutes. Stir in the turmeric and, if using, the asafetida (a powdered gum resin).
Stir in the tomatoes and bring to a simmer, stirring. Add the water or stock. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Remove from the heat, cover and refrigerate until chilled.
Just before serving check the seasonings. Serve sprinkled with coriander. Serve the yogurt alongside so it can be stirred in to taste.
